Package src.interfaces

Interface IAdminRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminRepository
public interface IAdminRepository
Interface for managing administrative operations related to hospital staff

    • removeStaff

      boolean removeStaff(String hospitalID)
      Removes a staff member from the system
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the staff member to remove
      Returns:
      true if staff member was successfully removed, false otherwise

      Returns:
